Bio Effect Hydrating Cream

Brand: BIOEFFECT

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER (AQUA), CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, C12-20 ACID PEG-8 ESTER, CETYL ALCOHOL, DL-ALPHA TOCOPHEROL, PHENOXYETHANOL, SODIUM HYALURONATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, CARBOMER, SORBITAN OLEATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE, CITRIC ACID, BARLEY (HORDERUM VULGARE) SEED EXTRACT, EGF (BARLEY SH-OLIGOPEPTIDE-1)
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
